scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Nativity of Christ within a rustic stable. The Virgin Mary, in a blue robe, kneels with hands clasped in prayer before the Christ Child, who lies on the ground radiating light. To the right, Saint Joseph, also in prayer, wears a pink robe and blue hood. An angel kneels behind Mary, and a donkey and ox are present. In the background, shepherds are shown tending their sheep, with a distant view of a walled city and a tower. An angel in the sky holds a scroll with "Gloria in excelsis Deo" inscribed.
